subject: PC to control box cable, big rumble
description_text: Hi, I ordered your rumble and control box from Aliexpress, and I have a Moza pedal, but the PC cable for the rumble control box didn't come with the order. Can I use another type of USB-B cable or do I need to purchase one of yours??

conversations.body_text: Hi Luca Pavanello, You will need a USB-A data cable, typically the same type used for printer connections.

Thank you for your answer.

On Wednesday, Jan 7, 2026, at 08:39 service@simsonn.com
